That was an iron cell...how did you get out!?
I rubbed it really hard and it melted.
No way...they forgot to lock it!?
It might be a trap. You should be careful Alsy,
I rubbed it really hard and it melted.
\n<Meria>They've been draining you so much, and yet
you can still crack a joke huh? That's my big brother!
\n<Meria>But don't you think it's weird you could just get out?
It might be some kind of trap.

there's a 99% chance they closed it to begin with.

parameters: Is there some place you can hide!?
What do we do Alsy! There must be somewhere you can hide...!
MP_SET_MOVIE アルス立ち絵アニメ基本
\n<Alsto>But, this could be our big chance.
It's the perfect time to search for an escape route
while they're caught up in the moment.
\n<Alsto>\n[1]. If you are able to run away,
then do so. Do not worry about me.
As long as you are safe...
\n<Alsto>Although it is a little far from here, there is
a nearby guild you can call on for help.
\n<\n[1]>Alsy, I can hear your stomach groaning.
I'll bring back some food for you, okay?
There is no need to rush yourself for me.
MP_SET_MOVIE ロメリア立ち絵アニメ基本2
\n<Meria>That was kind of weird wasn't it?
Well, this could be a big chance for us though.
\n<Meria>You might be able to look for some way out
while those three idiots are distracted!
Could I ask you to get something to eat when you go?
\C[0]If you are caught and milked, your mind can become lost in
pleasure. During these events, your sanity level will change.
Find snacks and share them with Alsto to recover sanity.
Check your current sanity by using the Hand Mirror in your
items list. (Sanity is initially set to 10)

MP_SET_MOVIE ロメリア立ち絵アニメ基本2
Sneak around carefully so you don't get spotted okay?
\n<Meria>Alstroemeria means, "to look to the future" in the language of flowers.
I'm sure both of us will end up just fine!
I'm glad you're here with me.
\n<Meria>I was really embarrassed that we got a name
like that you know, but now...
I don't think it's so bad.
\n<Meria>I guess there's no way around this but...
Try not to think too much about doing lewd things with those
succubi, OK? They're demons after all right? Monsters!
Alright. I have faith in you.
You're a grown lady now. I'm proud to be your brother.
Got it. I'll be waiting for you.
The iron bars have been securely fastened...
A corpse can be seen inside...

\n<Lily>Aha♥ Look at that, they came again♥
Look at this weak little penis~
It really does love to be pleasured, doesn't it?
\n<Lime>Mm♥ You've ejaculated 6 times now, haven't you?
I bet you're really pleased with that new dick of yours-
\n<Lime>Mm♥ You've ejaculated 6 times now, haven't you?
You're not going to die are you?
By the time it's my turn they'll be dead-nya.
Come on Lily-nya! My turn next-nya!
\n<Lily>Not so fast, next is Lime's turn.
If you kill him, I'll kill you-nya.
\n<Lily>Not so fast, next is Lime's turn.
Order is very important you know.
Sorry. I think I sucked too hard.
Are you alright!? Are you dead!?
You look like you've been beaten up pretty bad...
\n<Meria>I've been calling you so many times that
I thought you were really dead...
You came here to save me,
but Alsy ended up getting caught instead...
But I never thought something like this would happen...
\n<Meria>I've been nothing but trouble to you Alsy...
And being captured by demons...I'm a failure as a hunter.
We have to break out of here somehow.
As long as you're alive, we'll be just fine.
We have to break out of here somehow.
We have to get out of here, beat those guys up and return
home. We can't sit idle and do nothing right?
Is there anything here we can use?
Like something to open the cage...
As long as you're alive, we'll be just fine.
I guess it's just as well they didn't drain me to death.
Is there anything here we can use?
We have to get out of here somehow...
You weren't replying and I was worried.
You're somehow still alive. I'm so glad...
How dare they do such a thing to my sister...
Well, it happens. As long as you're a succubus hunter
\n<Alsto>It's better than being converted to their side I'd say.
Having something like a dick is nothing.
Mother did good job raising such a strong child.
\n<Alsto>I had come to save you but ended up
Those who plunder mummies become mummies eh?

and really do become mummies though...

It's movements are limited from being a plant. Note they may
spit saliva if they're approached. This will inflict
burns if it touches the skin. Not to mention the smell!
Any food will do, and will happily eat just about anything.
(※Do not give them your arm because they will eat it.)
It cannot digest bones however, so they will spit it out.
As typical of plant-based demons, they seem to be
highly vulnerable to fire based attacks.
PS: Due to the extreme appetite, they seem to have eaten the
key from the housemaid. But because we have a spare, there
is no need to kill them to take it out.

リリー達の日記について
リリー達の日記について
\n<\n[1]>（淫魔の癖に筆まめなやつらだ。
何か脱出のヒントになることは無かっただろうか。）
・リリーはわざと捕まって地下牢に入っていた
→脱獄してそのまま館を乗っ取った
・リリーは館を襲撃してシィナを淫魔化させた
→襲撃時に数人吸い尽くした
・リリーはシィナの頼みで一緒に暮らすことにした
→館主当ての手紙の紋章から名前を取った
・シィナはこの館の人間に捕まって館主のペットにされた
→館主は珍しい生き物が好き
→スラミーの生息地は本来ダンデリオ周辺
・シィナは精奴隷を解放したことがある
→吸い尽くさないこともある？
・リリーたちがギルドに依頼を出した
・シィナが囚人服を見つけた
→何故か館に囚人服があった
・リリー達はたまに何かの視線を感じることがある
・ある日突然大量のオークが湧いた
→リリーがチャームをしてオークを使役している
・アーコは商売をするために館に来た
・精奴隷の食事はライムが作る
→レシピはここで働いていた料理人のもの
・過去に脱獄した精奴隷がいる
→鍵を掛け忘れたわけではない
・ライムは食欲旺盛なようだ
・リリーは本を読むのが趣味なようだ
・リリーたちは恋について考えることがある
→少しは話が通じる可能性がある？
・リリーとシィナはよくケンカをする
→お互いに自分の方が上だと思っているようだ
・ライムは直射日光で溶ける
→スラミーの性質が引き継がれている
→ノラ猫時代に培った野生の感
・リリーは恋愛小説にハマっている
→淫魔の癖に乙女な部分もあるようだ
・アーコは人間と淫魔の共存を願っている
→根本的に人間＝食料なので難しい
